subject: How to handle Exception?
msgSnippet: Hi All, How to handle the following scenario. Suggestions will be mostly appreciated. Implementation Method: Boolean abcMethod() throws xException { bole
messageBody:
Hi All,

How to handle the following scenario. Suggestions will be mostly
appreciated.

Implementation Method:

Boolean abcMethod() throws xException
{
bole retFlag = false;
try{
________________;
________________;
________________;
retFlag = true;
}
catch(Exception ex)
{
____________;

throw new xException(ex);
}
return retFlag;
}


Test Method:

public void testabcMethod()
{
try
{
bole ret = obj.abcMethod();
assertFalse(ret);
}
catch (Exception e)
{
______________;

}
}

In above method whenever exception occurs its coming to the catch block of
testmethod and its not returning false which is expected and because of that
test method is failing.


Could you please help me in this issue?

Thanks in Advance.

Thanks & Regards,

Anil Jadhav
